item.title: Clint the Stranger
item.description: Clint the Stranger, also known as Clint the Nevada's Loner, Nevada Clint and Clint, the Lonely Nevadan, is a 1967 Italian spaghetti western starring George Martin. A sequel entitled The Return of Clint the Stranger would follow in 1972.

item.title: Per 100.000 dollari ti ammazzo
item.description: Per 100.000 dollari ti ammazzo is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film. It represents the directorial debut film of Giovanni Fago. On the set of this film Gianni Garko got to know Susanna Martinkova, a Czechoslovakian actress at her debut in an Italian production, who little later married the actor and had a daughter with him.

item.title: Ten Thousand Dollars for a Massacre
item.description: 10.000 dollari per un massacro is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Romolo Guerrieri.

item.title: La morte non conta i dollari
item.description: La morte non conta i dollari 1967 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Riccardo Freda. The film is about Lawrence White who returns to his hometown of Owell Rock with his sister to avenge the father's death at the hands of a gang. The leader of the gang, Doc Lester ahs recently appointed himself the gunslinger Boyd as the new sheriff.

item.title: Johnny Yuma
item.description: Johnny Yuma (1966) is a spaghetti western starring Mark Damon, Rosalba Neri, and Lawrence Dobkin. The title character earned his name by his exploits in a gunfight in Yuma, Arizona and has no relation to the 1961 The Rebel American television series.

item.title: Tal der Hoffnung
item.description: Tal der Hoffnung ist ein Italowestern von Alfonso Balcázar aus dem Jahr 1967.

item.title: Django – der Bastard
item.description: Django – der Bastard ist ein von Giovanni Fago 1967 gedrehter Italowestern. Die deutschsprachige Erstaufführung erfolgte am 19. April 1968.

item.title: 10.000 blutige Dollar
item.description: 10.000 blutige Dollar ist ein Italowestern von Romolo Guerrieri aus dem Jahr 1967, der in Deutschland am 8. März 1968 erstaufgeführt wurde.

item.title: Der Tod zählt keine Dollar
item.description: Der Tod zählt keine Dollar ist ein von Riccardo Freda unter dem Pseudonym George Lincoln gedrehter Italowestern aus dem Jahr 1967, der in Deutschland erst am 30. Mai 1969 in die Kinos gelangte.

item.title: Johnny Yuma
item.description: Johnny Yuma ist ein Italowestern von Romolo Guerrieri aus dem Jahr 1966. Die Deutschlandpremiere war am 5. Mai 1967.
